content: Hi there, I want to sell my gambling accounts (I cannot specify the website here) which have good levels, it take tremendous time and a lot of money to get to that level. Level 5 account I’m selling it for 0.08 BTC (negotiable) for those that are interested.The big levels offers you benefits such as bigger bonuses. To those that are interested, please let me know.

comments.author: jrrsparkles
comments.body: Casinos prohibit the selling of accounts so the buyer has to keep that in mind if they are willing to buy a casino account.Casinos can find the change in betting patterns and ask for KYC reviews since it become mandatory on every casino so it is another downside of buying accounts from others but if still want to buy then it's your choice.

comments.author: Onix91
comments.body: Hello.Not on this website, I’m sure about it. It is not a very popular one but it is a valid website at the same time. This website doesn’t ask for your ID and I’m already using vpn on it. Multiple times I’ve changed the betting patterns since it is an account since 2018.
